title: Only corki the God here
body: So im smurfing and could we please have riot create a video of a 450 ap lb with zero penetration full bursting two identical champions with 4k hp, one with 40 mr, and the other with 120 mr. Make every bronze to gold player watch it upon every login. (not skippable) My fizz whinging about vlad being op and killing him over and over i say build mr den he say "why would i go tank fizz?" (THey had double ap and so did we abyssal woulda been GOAT) he was also top lane fizz LEL

replies.body:
typical only corki rant. back to ur ori op pleb stuff pls.

u r probably 1 of the plebs claiming ekko op too.


but i do agree that lb op pls nerf
The turn that that comment made me laugh xD
lb isnt op, its just a good burst to show how op resists are, ori is garbage now, i made a long thread explaining how ekko isnt op, guess you missed it.
